Title: Mass Electrification
Description:
Allows you to electrify much more track in one go. Press Control while using the electrification tool to extend the selection to up to thousands of tracks at once.

Source: https://github.com/jorn86/VoxelTycoonMods
Changelog: https://github.com/jorn86/VoxelTycoonMods/blob/master/MassElectrification/changelog.md

Version 0.1.0
